## StoresClient.getFiles() method

Get file contents from a policy store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFiles(request: GetFilesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): Promise<GetFilesResponse>;
```

## Example


```typescript
const { storeVersion, files } = await stores.getFiles({
  storeId: "MWPKEMFX3CK1",
  files: ["policy.yaml"],
});
```
